roasts.name: Time & Temperature Espresso
roasts.tasting_notes:
Sweet, fruity, tart cherries, not so much chocolate. Not really my style, but looking forward to playing more with this.

Tandem calls it "Effervescent, electric, and just plain cool."

I totally agree.

roasts.name: Stoker
roasts.tasting_notes:
Espresso: Balanced, sweet, delicate, pleasantly coffee grounds/chocolate, but lighter bodied. Tastes "darker" than it looks. Delicious.

Drip: Outstanding! Fruity, chocolatey, full bodied. Perfect.
